channel.title: CVE Feed for ITPison -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ITPison -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-32965|2024-09-16T20:57:26.072Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: OMICARD EDM has a hard-coded machine key. An unauthenticated remote attacker can use the machine key to send serialized payload to the server to execute arbitrary code, manipulate system data and disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2024-4894|2024-08-01T20:55:10.323Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: ITPison OMICARD EDM fails to properly filter specific URL parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to modify the parameters and conduct Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. This vulnerability enables attackers to probe internal network information.

item.title: CVE-2024-4894|2024-06-11T20:23:58.948Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: ITPison OMICARD EDM fails to properly filter specific URL parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to modify the parameters and conduct Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. This vulnerability enables attackers to probe internal network information.
